LEGO®

This is the LEGO® subdirectory, where I've indexed all my LEGO®-related pages. Here is a handy table of contents:

  • Various LEGO® sets in LDD for your convenience

You may also be interested in FaRCX, which is software for controlling LEGO® Mindstorms RCX robots over the internet which my friend wrote (with a little help from me) and which I operate out of a spare bedroom.
